OOC: Someone needs to update the map... <cough> rAuq <cough> <cough> Crap 
forgot to finish this...

> ::Kaiser:: 
>       He initiates scans of the planet, searching for a secluded area, away 
> from the other major powers.  "I recommend this island here."  He points to 
> the southernmost Island and it flashes on the map.  "It's isolated and 
> easily defended due to the cliffs all the way around it."  He nods 
> approvingly.  "Yes, this is the place."

--part1_12c.1af70942.2b01cd62_boundary

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>OOC: Someone needs to update the map... <cough> rAuq <cough> <cough> Crap forgot to finish this...
<BR></BLOCKQUOTE>
<BR><BLOCKQUOTE TYPE=CITE style="BORDER-LEFT: #0000ff 2px solid; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px">::Kaiser:: 
<BR>      He initiates scans of the planet, searching for a secluded area, away from the other major powers.  "I recommend this island here."  He points to the southernmost Island and it flashes on the map.  "It's isolated and easily defended due to the cliffs all the way around it."  He nods approvingly.  "Yes, this is the place."</FONT></HTML>
